title: Uruoi
subtitle: Uruoi
header: Uruoi is a blessing of water for every skin relieving dryness with a gentle touch since 1989. It is made in Japan.

content.header: Uruoi concentrates on the core elements of skincare to combine an authentically Japanese minimalist philosophy and powerful ingredients backed by science.
paragraphs: This project was all about minimalism.
My main objective was to come up with a design to support brand’s philosophy as well as bring it to the digital world in the best shape.

content.header: To develop this website a unique stack of technologies was used to enable custom animations.
paragraphs: A lot of attention was paid to such tiny little things like cute hovers, button animations, smooth transitions between pages and other interaction elements. This way we aimed at creating a very pleasant and memorable online experience for the brand’s customers.
